systemConfigurations.title: System Configurations
systemConfigurations.dateFormatDescription: Choose how dates are displayed throughout the application
systemConfigurations.timezoneDescription: Set your preferred timezone for date and time display
systemConfigurations.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface
systemConfigurations.previewDescription: See how your settings will look
systemConfigurations.settingsNote: These settings will apply to all dates displayed throughout the application, including tables, forms, and other components. Changes take effect immediately.
